Play:
The Twins and the Sumida River
(Futago Sumidagawa / 雙生隅田川)

Written By: Chikamatsu Monzaemon (近松門左衛門)

First Staged: 1720

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Chikamatsu: 5 Late Plays, translated and annotated by C. Andrew Gerstle (New York: Columbia University Press, c2001); February 1988 Program

Performances:

September 1973: The Twins and the Sumida River

October 1973: The Twins and the Sumida River

February 1988: The Twins and the Sumida River

February 1997: The Twins and the Sumida River

Characters:

Sota, in fact Shichiro (Sarujima Sōta jitsuwa Awaji Shichirō / 猿嶋惣太実は淡路七郎)

Karaito (Sōta nyōbō Karaito / 惣太女房から糸)

Sajitayu (Haegashira no Sajitayū / 蠅頭の左次太夫)

Bozuko (Bōzuko / 坊主子)

Mutsu (Mutsu / 六)

Suika (Suika (Suikuwa) / すいか(すいくわ))

Yazo (Hanewana no Yazō (Yaji) / はねわなの弥蔵(弥次))

Umewakamaru (Yoshida Umewakamaru / 吉田梅若丸)

Takekuni (Agata no Gonnokami Takekuni / 県の権正武国)

Hanjogozen (Hanjo Gozen / 班女御前)

Hokaibo, in fact Tengu (Yamabushi Hōkaibō jitsuwa Tengu / 山伏法界坊実は天狗)

Matsuwakamaru (Yoshida Matsuwakamaru / 吉田松若丸)
